title: A onda da vida (2011)
storyline: The story begins when three surfers from Rio De Janeiro go on a trip across Brazilian coast in search of perfect waves and new dreams. This adventure is going to change their lives. During the trip, everything seems fine until a broken wheel leave them stranded somewhere in the middle of the road. Tiago, Joel and Caio are very upset and begin to argue, but soon they realize that they will be much better off if they stay together. When an old man offers them a ride, they discover a quaint fishermen village, with a deserted beach and perfect waves. there they meet amazing people and a way of life that makes them ponder about their own lives, values, friendship and love.
